title: 3476 freezing
message: Have a 3476 that chimes on startup, has fan etc. checked all components and traces around u7100, but it either crashes on start up(sometimes), or freezes(mostly) with the apple logo and an empty progress bar. If I change the SSD, it boots but very slowly and then goes right to recovery. If I plug in my external drive via USB it freezes too (known working external drive). Ideas where to go from here?

title: 3476 freezing
message: Start with inspecting the board under microscope and run ASD 162 EFI and report result.....

title: 3476 freezing
message: Pretty sure this one will be hopeless unless there is signs of liquid or U6100 was messed with.
